name: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
description: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

review.author: clotildevernyidrac
review.heading: Don't understand the bad reviews...
review.reviewBody: I don't know if it's because I didn't watch the TV Show, but I really don't understand why those 2 movies are discredited this much. Yes it's not realistic (at all), the stories are very exaggerated, and not very perfectionists, but I don't watch those movies for realism, I watch them to spend a good time, to clear my head, because I love the actors, and everything is so light! It does not sell more than what it is, and for that I really enjoy watching the 2 movies whenever I am in a bad mood!
